forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.
